mod.name: FruityMod
mod.description: Adds The Seeker as a new playable character.

cards.name: Astral Haze
cards.description: Ethereal. The first time each enemy attacks you this turn, apply 2 Vulnerable and 2 Weak to it.

cards.name: Astral Haze+
cards.description: Ethereal. The first time each enemy attacks you this turn, apply 3 Vulnerable and 3 Weak to it.

cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+

cards.name: Dazed
cards.description:
Ethereal.

cards.name: Brainstorm+

relics.name: Arcanosphere
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you may Top-Cycle 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The Arcanosphere is a powerful relic brought by The Seeker from the Astral Plane.

relics.name: Rod of Negation
relics.description: You may discard 1 card from your starting hand to gain 1 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: Imbued with chaotic power, this rod emits a ghastly purple glow on those around it.

relics.name: Blueberries
relics.description: Gain 1 max HP for each Ethereal card in your deck.

relics.name: Paper Pengwin
relics.description: When you are Frail, Weak, or Vulnerable, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

relics.name: Solar Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add an Ethereal card to your deck, it is Upgraded
relics.flavorText: An egg-shaped meteorite that fell from the sun. It glows warmly.

relics.name: Telescope
relics.description: Choose any number of cards in your starting hand to gain Ethereal.
relics.flavorText: With this telescope, one can see further than ever before.

relics.name: Cosmic Sieve
relics.description: Whenever an Ethereal card enters your Exhaust Pile, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Phases in and out of existence. Cool to the touch.

keywords.name: Recycle
keywords.description: When you Recycle a card, shuffle it randomly into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Reflect
keywords.description: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal this amount of damage back to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Top-cycle
keywords.description: When you Top-Cycle a card, place it on top of your draw pile.
